summary:
*The Hunchback of Notre-Dame* is a famous French book by Victor Hugo. It tells the sad story of Quasimodo, a hunchback bell-ringer, and his love for a gypsy dancer named Esmeralda. The book is set in the beautiful Notre-Dame Cathedral in Paris during the 1400s.

This classic story has been made into many movies and shows. It teaches us about the importance of saving old buildings and shows how people's lives were during that time in France.
title: The Hunchback of Notre-Dame
